Articles.Content:
I've been away from my computer for a few days, and that of course means no Kerbal Space Program. So, while sitting around doing nothing, I decided to draw some scenes of KSP. Some details are missing, and perspective is a bit off on the drawings, but I enjoyed drawing them and hope they look cool to you guys!

A KSO shuttle just entering space!

A KSO shuttle docked up to a satellite / telescope!

Again, a KSO shuttle docked to a station in orbit over some distant planet. They're there to repair the weird-looking solar panels!

Edited August 31, 2014 by B787_300
making the image tags work

Fixed your image links for you. The {IMG} tags need a image file not a link to the imgur gallery like you had, Just a heads up

Edited August 31, 2014 by B787_300
Oh ok, thanks! Will keep it in mind for the future!
if you make an album you can also link the imgur album and have the images be scrollable

Wow, this is really great! I wish I could draw that good instead of playing piano.. I'd love to draw pictures like these but my drawings look pretty stupid..

The detail in the third picture is really well done! It nearly looks like a screenshot! Do you plan on drawing and publishing more?

Wow, this is really great! I wish I could draw that good instead of playing piano.. I'd love to draw pictures like these but my drawings look pretty stupid..

The detail in the third picture is really well done! It nearly looks like a screenshot! Do you plan on drawing and publishing more?

Thanks for the comment! Also, you get better the more you draw so don't give up on it! I plan on drawing more when I get the time, definetly! At the moment I just need to find out what I'd like to draw next in the KSP universe
